tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Meet the World's Biggest Mammal
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Blue whales have complex calls that can be heard for miles. One scientist is on a mission to uncover the meaning of their songs.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Humanities
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: The branches of learning regarded as having primarily a cultural character and which usually include language, literature, history, mathematics and philosophy

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Beautiful creatures and nice to watch, not eat. I have stopped eating whales, even though they taste good in my memories.. Check out﻿ my videos :)
est-ce possible d'avoir une traduction sur ces﻿ vidéo en français?
Somebody's jealous...﻿
Worry about your own grammar﻿ and snaggled teeth.
lol i love it when canadians call americans the fat people when canada is the 2nd fattest coutnry in the world﻿ 2% lower than america
Thank﻿ you
Apparently blue whales make﻿ people want to get into nationalistic rages
This is fucking rad !﻿

Ridiculous. You are implying American's as a whole are represented by those who have achieved greatness...How silly. First of all Athletes differ greatly with time, today it may be an American, tomorrow someone﻿ else...Thirdly wow...No way...Biggest film starts are American? That couldn't at all be due to their culture of TV and whatnot could it? Think about it for a moment. Think of their population then think of their culture. Also having a big army is not a good thing, it is ridiculous.
Such great﻿ creatures!
Thats something that I want﻿ to do

It's not hard. Do the math. Britain population divided by its total square miles and you'll see that you guys are overpopulated. Why do you think houses are closer together and smaller in the UK?
yea you guys did better per population in the﻿ olympics but again. Do the math, you guys sent over 550 athletes to the olympics while the US sent 528 athletes. + you guys had home turf. and you still lost. Ur economy is not better than ours, OUR gdp and gdp per capita is higher than yours. EDUCATE plz
My thoughts exactly cpande1.﻿ Ridiculous.
We're afraid of them? Who﻿ says we're afraid?
Alright well just relax yourself﻿ for a minute ok? There whales, not god
Massive, yet so understood! These creatures don't have a mean bone in their bodies and yet we are﻿ afraid of then because of their size!! It's their beauty
what﻿ a cool job that man has!

I don't know what you mean by saying "Athletes differe greatly with time". And the biggest film stars are American, are you kidding me? I went to London a few years ago and at the cinema, the only big movie there that was not America was Harry Potter. And population? China has over a billion people so they should have﻿ the largest cultural influence on the world right? They don't. And as for a large army - it's the decisions American politicians have made that are bad, not the strength of it.

Most of the movies people watch, songs people listen to came from America. What are the most popular athletes?﻿ American. What are the most popular entertainers? American. What is the most powerful country in the world in terms of military strength or cultural influence? America. And by the way in case you weren't aware, America is a country made of immigrant. That's why it's so beautiful when we dominate the Olympics, because we have blacks, whites, hispanics and Asians all representing America.
someone is﻿ mad? I am American and proud to be one.

Holy shit... I watch a video on blue whales and I﻿ scroll down to the comments and find shit like, "Athletes differ greatly with time..." "I went to London and Harry Potter was the biggest movie" and "You're a lame ass piece of shit Canadian!"
Like... really? Jesus...
I'll fite N﻿ E cunt I'm Blak irl
That's﻿ the internet for you.

I don't know what you mean by saying "Athletes differe greatly with time". And the biggest film stars are American, are you kidding me? I went to London a few years ago and at the cinema, the﻿ only big movie there that was not America was Harry Potter. And population? China has﻿ over a billion people so they should have the largest cultural influence on the world right? They don't. And as for a large army - it's the decisions American politicians have made that are bad, not the strength of it.
MUSIC﻿

Reviewer.Movies: Anything that has to do with Comedy and Horror.

Reviewer.Books: A lot of Postmodern Science Fiction
Reviewer.Movies: Favorite Movies- Always in a mood for watching a flick. However my favorite director is Stanley Kubrick Favorite T.V shows-Don't watch too much but I do watch some cool and funny shows!

Reviewer.Music: Dont have one just like pop music

everything. but country. i hate country
